src:
Zvezdina deca se vratila na trijumfalni put: Dva gola Juga Stanojeva
Grafosi lako preslišali Žarkovo

04 Nov 2019

Do pre tri sedmice Grafičar je bio možda i najveći kandidat za ulazak u Superligu. Bez pardona su igrala Zvezdina deca i sa liderske pozicije gledala rivale.
Međutim, Ljubičaste je u nevreme zadrmala kriza, dva vezana poraza učinila su da ekipa Milije Žižića izgubi prvo mesto. Bolni su bili neuspesi protiv Zlatibora i Radničkog, ali Zvezdina filijala se vratila na pobednički kolosek. Gotovo rutinski Grafičar je u poslednjem meču 16. kola Prve lige Srbije slavio na gostovanju Žarkovu sa 3:0.
Tokom jeseni se uglavnom pričalo o vezisti Željku Gavriću, momku koji je projektovan da na zimu bude prebačen u prvi tim Crvene zvezde. Vezista rođen 2000. godine je nosio Grafičar, a danas je njegovu ulogu preuzeo Jug Stanojev. Klasić Dejana Joveljića i braće Ilić je danas postigao dva pogotka i trasirao put ka pobedi gostima.
Krilni fudbaler rođen 1999. godine je pogađao u 30. i 42. minutu. Dakle, već posle prvog poluvremena mogao je da se nasluti pobednik.
Trijumf Grafičara podebljao je Džugurdić u 90. minutu.

SRBIJA 2 - 17. KOLO: 

PetakBačka – Dinamo Vranje  2:0 (1:0)/Žakula 23, 77/
SubotaRadnički Kragujevac – Kabel  0:1 (0:1)/Izečukvu 33/
Sinđelić – Zemun  2:1 (1:0)/Ilić 15, Joković 87 – Vukajlović 55p/
Trajal – Budućnost  2:1  (1:1)/Juf 39, Kecap 60 – Perić 5/
Metalac - Radnički Pirot  1:0 (1:0)/Ješić 10/
NedeljaZlatibor - Novi Pazar 1:0 (0:0)/U. Stamenić 59/
Kolubara - Smederevo 2:1 (0:0)/Milisavljević 72. penal, 89 -  Đorđević 82/ 
PonedeljakŽarkovo - Grafičar 0:3 (0:2)/Stanojev 30 i 42, Džugurdić 90/
text:
Star children return to triumphant journey: Two goals by South Stanojev
The graffiti easily overheard Zarkovo

04 Nov 2019

Until three weeks ago, the Graphic artist was perhaps the biggest contender to enter the Super League. Star children played without pardons and watched rivals from a leading position.
However, the Violence was shaken by the crisis, two tied defeats that made the team of Mili Zizic lose first place. Sick were the setbacks against Zlatibor and Radnicki, but the Star Branch was back on track. It is almost routine that in the last match of the 16th round of the First League of Serbia, the Graphicist celebrated Zharkov with 3: 0.
During the fall, it was mostly talked about midfielder Zeljko Gavric, a guy projected to be transferred to the Red Star first team for the winter. The midfielder born in 2000 was worn by the Graphic Artist, and today his role has been taken by Jug Stanojev. Dejan Joveljic's classic and the Ilic brothers scored two goals today and paved the way for the win for the guests.
The winged footballer born in 1999 scored in the 30th and 42nd minutes. So, after the first half, the winner could be guessed.
Graphic's triumph was bold by Dzugurdic in the 90th minute.

SERBIA 2 - ROUND 17:

PetakBacka - Dinamo Vranje 2: 0 (1: 0) / Zacula 23, 77 /
SaturdayRadnicki Kragujevac - Kabel 0: 1 (0: 1) / Izechukvu 33 /
Sindjelic - Zemun 2: 1 (1: 0) / Ilic 15, Jokovic 87 - Vukajlovic 55p /
Trajal - Buducnost 2: 1 (1: 1) / Juf 39, Kecap 60 - Peric 5 /
Metalac - Radnicki Pirot 1: 0 (1: 0) / Jesic 10 /
NedeljaZlatibor - Novi Pazar 1: 0 (0: 0) / U. Stamenić 59 /
Kolubara - Smederevo 2: 1 (0: 0) / Milisavljevic 72nd Penalty, 89 - Djordjevic 82 /
MondayZarkovo - Graphicist 0: 3 (0: 2) / Stanojev 30 & 42, Dzugurdic 90 /
